text: Wilhelm "Willy" Kernen (6 August 1929 â€“ 12 November 2009) was a Swiss footballer. He played as a defender. He played for La Chaux-de-Fonds, winning two Swiss league titles and five Swiss Cups. He was in the Switzerland squad at the 1950, 1954 and 1962 FIFA World Cups. Kernen was born in La Chaux-de- Fonds. Kernen died on 12 November 2009 in La Chaux-de-Fonds, at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1929 births Category:2009 deaths Category:1950 FIFA World Cup players Category:1954 FIFA World Cup players Category:1962 FIFA World Cup players Category:Swiss footballers Category:People from La Chaux-de-Fonds
title: Willy Kernen
